_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Paper
author: parker@pterodactyl.io

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Paper Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
echo "Installer will start in 5 secconds"
sleep 1
echo "Installer will start in 4 secconds"
sleep 1
echo "Installer will start in 3 secconds"
sleep 1
echo "Installer will start in 2 secconds"
sleep 1
echo "Installer will start in 1 secconds"
sleep 1
echo -e               "########################################################"
echo -e "#\033[1;39;44m    ___      _     _                 _                \033[0m#"
echo -e "#\033[1;39;44m   / __\___ | | __| | /\  /\___  ___| |_   ___ _   _  \033[0m#"
echo -e '#\033[1;39;44m  / /  / _ \| |/ _` |/ /_/ / _ \/ __| __| / _ \ | | | \033[0m#'
echo -e '#\033[1;39;44m / /__| (_) | | (_| / __  / (_) \__ \ |_ |  __/ |_| | \033[0m#'
echo -e '#\033[1;39;44m \____/\___/|_|\__,_\/ /_/ \___/|___/\__(_)___|\__,_| \033[0m#'
echo -e "#\033[1;39;44m                                                      \033[0m#"
echo -e               "########################################################"
echo -e ""
echo -e "Installer is starting... "
PROJECT=paper

if [ -n "${DL_PATH}" ]; then
	echo -e "Using supplied download url: ${DL_PATH}"
	DOWNLOAD_URL=`eval echo $(echo ${DL_PATH} | sed -e 's/{{/${/g' -e 's/}}/}/g')`
else
	VER_EXISTS=`curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT} | jq -r --arg VERSION $MINECRAFT_VERSION '.versions[] | contains($VERSION)' | grep -m1 true`
	LATEST_VERSION=`curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT} | jq -r '.versions' | jq -r '.[-1]'`

	if [ "${VER_EXISTS}" == "true" ]; then
		echo -e "Version is valid. Using version ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"
	else
		echo -e "Specified version not found. Defaulting to the latest ${PROJECT} version"
		MINECRAFT_VERSION=${LATEST_VERSION}
	fi

	BUILD_EXISTS=`curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}/versions/${MINECRAFT_VERSION} | jq -r --arg BUILD ${BUILD_NUMBER} '.builds[] | tostring | contains($BUILD)' | grep -m1 true`
	LATEST_BUILD=`curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}/versions/${MINECRAFT_VERSION} | jq -r '.builds' | jq -r '.[-1]'`

	if [ "${BUILD_EXISTS}" == "true" ]; then
		echo -e "Build is valid for version ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}. Using build ${BUILD_NUMBER}"
	else
		echo -e "Using the latest ${PROJECT} build for version ${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"
		BUILD_NUMBER=${LATEST_BUILD}
	fi

	JAR_NAME=${PROJECT}-${MINECRAFT_VERSION}-${BUILD_NUMBER}.jar

	echo "Version being downloaded"
	echo -e "MC Version: ${PROJECT}-${MINECRAFT_VERSION}"
	echo -e "Build: ${BUILD_NUMBER}"
	echo -e "JAR Name of Build: ${JAR_NAME}"
	DOWNLOAD_URL=https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}/versions/${MINECRAFT_VERSION}/builds/${BUILD_NUMBER}/downloads/${JAR_NAME}
fi

cd /mnt/server

#echo -e "Downloading ${SERVER_JARFILE} at ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"

if [ -f ${SERVER_JARFILE} ]; then
	mv ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${SERVER_JARFILE}.old
fi

downloader ${DOWNLOAD_URL} /mnt/server/${SERVER_JARFILE}
mkdir -p /mnt/server/config
if [ ! -f server.properties ]; then
    #echo -e "Downloading MC server.properties"
    downloader https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Coldhost/eggs/refs/heads/master/games/minecraft/java/server.properties /mnt/server/server.properties
fi

if [ ! -f config/log4j2.xml ]; then
    downloader https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Coldhost/eggs/refs/heads/master/games/minecraft/java/log4j2.xml /mnt/server/config/log4j2.xml
fi

printf "\033[1m\033[33mcontainer@coldhost.eu~ \033[0mInstaller Complete!\n"

variables.name: Minecraft Version
variables.description:
The version of minecraft to download. 

Leave at latest to always get the latest version. Invalid versions will default to latest.

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the server jarfile to run the server with.

variables.name: Download Path
variables.description: A URL to use to download a server.jar rather than the ones in the install script. This is not user viewable.

variables.name: Build Number
variables.description:
The build number for the paper release.

Leave at latest to always get the latest version. Invalid versions will default to latest.

variables.name: Antivirus
variables.description:
Disable Antivirus

Can speedup startup process if you wish
WARNING: Unless you know what youre doing, please, for your safety, leave this on.

variables.name: Scan Only Plugins
variables.description: If disabled, scans whole container (excluding cache files and other than executables)

variables.name: Autodelete quarantine
variables.description: Remove automaticaly everything in quarantine on start
